metadata.title: CVE-2020-25710 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenLDAP in versions before 2.4.56. This flaw allows anattacker who sends a malicious packet processed by OpenLDAP to force afailed assertion in csnNormalize23(). The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25710` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.11
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.11
slapd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.11
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.11').
